item.title: Eclipse Galileo unable to read Subversion repository
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: After a clean Snow Leopard install on a new machine, I fired up a fresh Galileo Eclipse and pointed it at a copy of my old workspace.

item.title: Missing MacOS X VM in Eclipse Galileo on Snow Leopard
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I recently encountered an issue where I was unable to add a JVM to my Eclipse install on Snow Leopard.

item.title: Rolling back from Subversive 0.7.8 in Eclipse Ganymede
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I've had automatic updates enabled on my Ganymede install of Eclipse.
